name: Mincing Governs
description:
Controls are written in the game, but here's what you should know now:

Keyboard and Mouse, Typing and Memorization, "Managing" a "Simulation".

Most policy words were suggested by wonderful TOJAM 2020 participants.

Suggest new policies here:
